title: Publisher Profile page routed by publisher ID

requirements.summary: Add an authenticated Publisher Profile route addressed by publisher ID and rendered within the existing authenticated AppLayout.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to `/publishers/<publisherId>` renders the Publisher Profile page inside the existing AppLayout (sidebar/header remain visible).
The route parameter is treated as a publisher ID and used to load the correct publisher record.

file_operations.description: Register a new TanStack Router route for the Publisher Profile page at `/publishers/<id>` (parameterized segment) under the existing authenticated root route so it renders inside AppLayout.
Create the Publisher Profile page component that reads the route publisher ID parameter and renders within the existing authenticated app layout via the router Outlet.

requirements.summary: Make publisher names in the Publishers table navigate to the selected publisher’s profile route using that publisher’s ID.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a publisher’s name in the table navigates to `/publishers/<id>` for that row.
The existing Edit/Delete actions continue to work unchanged.

file_operations.description: Replace the current non-functional name button handler with TanStack Router navigation (e.g., Link or navigate) to the Publisher Profile route using the row’s publisher.id, without changing existing filters, inactive styling, or Edit/Delete behaviors.

requirements.summary: Implement Publisher Profile UI showing the selected publisher’s details including heading, group, overseer/assistant statuses, and privileges.
acceptanceCriteria: The publisher full name is shown as the primary heading at the top of the page.
Group number, overseer status, assistant status, and privileges are visible and reflect the backend values for the selected publisher.
Overseer and Assistant are rendered as "Yes" or "No" (in English).

file_operations.description: Render the publisher’s fullName as the page heading and display fieldServiceGroup, isGroupOverseer (Yes/No), isGroupAssistant (Yes/No), and privileges (publisher/servant/elder) using existing UI primitives (e.g., shadcn-ui components). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a Back to Publishers button on the Publisher Profile page that navigates back to the Publishers list.
acceptanceCriteria: The Publisher Profile page includes a visible "Back to Publishers" button at the top.

file_operations.description: Add a "Back to Publishers" control at the top of the page using TanStack Router navigation (Link or navigate) to `/publishers`, using existing button styling/components (e.g., shadcn-ui Button). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Fetch a single publisher by ID via the existing backend API and handle loading and not-found states on the Publisher Profile page.
acceptanceCriteria: The frontend calls the backend to fetch a publisher by ID (using the existing backend method) when the Publisher Profile page loads.
While the publisher is loading, the page shows a loading state (in English).
If the publisher ID does not exist (backend returns null/empty), the page shows a clear "not found" message (in English) and still provides a way to return to `/publishers`.

file_operations.description: Add a React Query hook to fetch a single publisher by ID using the existing backend capability (actor.getPublisher), with query enabling tied to actor availability.

Use the route publisher ID parameter to call the single-publisher query hook; show an English loading state while fetching and an English "not found" state when the backend returns null, including a visible way to return to `/publishers`.
